title: Final Fantasy Soulslike Announcement at E3? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.24.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about a rumored new Final Fantasy spin-off called "Final Fantasy Origins", Bioumtant reviews, and more! Listen to the http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames post-show to hear Blessing Barrett argue about the top 25 open world games.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:35 - Housekeeping
It’s Monday, we got a bunch of new shows live for you right now!
The edited finale of me and Andy’s playthrough of Resident Evil 7 is up right now, edited by Roger Pokorny. It’s one you don’t want to miss. I’m lost, drunk, and terrified by the end of it.
A new Kinda Funny Podcast went up this morning where we help a Best Friend get engaged.
And a new Kinda Funny Xcast is up right now where they talk all about what Nintendo is up to with Xbox.
All of that is available right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunny and Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames along with your favorite podcast service.
This Friday, we’re battling the Knockout City dev team. If we win, we get the Kinda Funny logo in the game. If we lose… doesn’t matter; it’s not going to happen. Practice starts after KFGD Friday, and the big game is at noon PT.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report  -
00:06:08 - Square Enix is about to announce a new Final Fantasy game, and it’s a Soulslike - Imran Khan @ Fanbyte
00:16:00 - Why is it ok for FF games to continue to be exclusive to the sony platform and why..isn't there outsized "backlash"? - Best Friends Q:Karl
00:26:00 - Biomutant Review Round Up
00:33:00 - Ad
00:35:40 - We got a new image of the Uncharted movie! - New York Times, tweeted by Nibel on Twitter
00:41:40 - Rockstar Games announces its own record label - Press release
00:44:40 - Watch Dogs Was Originally a Driver Game - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:48:20 - Out today
 Reader mail  -
00:50:30 - So we all love Knockout City - but after next week will this love stick? - Billythedoor
00:55:25 - Required Reading: Special Report: The Inside Story of Blizzard's Departures and a Company at a Crossroads - Kat Bailey @ IGN
https://www.ign.com/articles/special-report-the-inside-story-of-blizzards-departures-and-a-company-at-a-crossroads
00:59:08 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Whitta

Blessing and Tim talk about a rumored new Final Fantasy spin-off called "Final Fantasy Origins", Bioumtant reviews, and more! Listen to the http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames post-show to hear Blessing Barrett argue about the top 25 open world games.

00:02:35 - Housekeeping

It’s Monday, we got a bunch of new shows live for you right now!

The edited finale of me and Andy’s playthrough of Resident Evil 7 is up right now, edited by Roger Pokorny. It’s one you don’t want to miss. I’m lost, drunk, and terrified by the end of it.

A new Kinda Funny Podcast went up this morning where we help a Best Friend get engaged.

And a new Kinda Funny Xcast is up right now where they talk all about what Nintendo is up to with Xbox.

All of that is available right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunny and Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames along with your favorite podcast service.

This Friday, we’re battling the Knockout City dev team. If we win, we get the Kinda Funny logo in the game. If we lose… doesn’t matter; it’s not going to happen. Practice starts after KFGD Friday, and the big game is at noon PT.
